com.soen.risk.controller

Class RiskReinforcementPhase

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.soen.risk.controller.RiskReinforcementPhase

  • public class RiskReinforcementPhase
extends java.lang.Object

    Reinforcement Phase Controller

    The class defines number of the armies given to the player calculation. In the reinforcements phase, the player is given a number of armies that depends on the number of countries he owns (# of countries owned divided by 3, rounded down). If the player owns all the countries of an entire continent else the player is given an amount of armies corresponding to the continent's control value.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Neha Dighe
